channel.title: Why can't we have chick characters
channel.description: hey, I was playing ingame and some guy ask me out and i was like "?? I'm a guy!" and he was like then why you got a chick char and then called me a fagg... but people think people are wierd cus the play a different gender character, it's a Role Playing Game!!! role play!! not like i walk around with a whip and blue armour in the street....

World of warcraft is a different story. Lol them pixal tits are better then runescapes.

item.title: Why can't we have chick characters
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Screw female characters in RuneScape, but in something such as WoW half my characters are female. My reasoning: I don’t want to have to stare at a guy’s ass all day. Plus, a lot of the WoW male models are just plain ugly to me.

Read full topic

I’ve never even thought about playing a girl char… Don’t see a point, coz some games I play you can’t even change the gender back. Even if you could, I would never do it, just seems pointless.

item.title: Why can't we have chick characters
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Its a role playing game, correct…BUT its to role play as a Knight, fighting dragons, doing quest, getting armour, etc. Not to role play as another gender.

Unless your a drag queen, a girl, or a fag. You should be using a male character.

Read full topic
